## Discussion

Call this method to remove the data store for the unique identifier. Release any [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView] instances using the data store before you call this method. If the system cannot complete removal of the data store, this throws an error.

# remove(forIdentifier:completionHandler:)

**Type Method**

Removes the data store that matches the identifier you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func remove(forIdentifier identifier: UUID, completionHandler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
@MainActor class func remove(forIdentifier identifier: UUID) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **identifier**: An identifier that uniquely identifies a data store.
- **completionHandler**: A block the system invokes after it removes the data store. This block has no return value, and takes the following parameter:



## Discussion

Call this method to remove the data store for the unique identifier. Release any [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView] instances using the data store before you call this method. If the system cannot complete removal of the data store, this throws an error.
title: remove(forIdentifier:completionHandler:)
